item.title: The top four visual trends for 2020 according to Adobe
item.description:
Adobe has predicted the biggest visual trends for 2020, sharing four key themes brands should embrace in a recent blog post. _Inclusivity for All Ages _ Marketing is moving away from solely youth-focused campaigns. Recognizing the influence and engagement of older demographics, brands are showcasing diverse, energetic individuals from various age groups. _Authenticity in Expression _ Consumers are increasingly drawn to genuine representations of themselves and their experiences. This desire for authenticity extends to brands, public figures, and politicians, who are expected to reflect real life in their messaging...
